p: To assess the hypoglycemic effect of the test substances, whole blood samples from the control and test groups of mice were drawn immediately before (0 h) and after 1, 3, and 6 h following administration of standard drug and test samples, by tail snip method. BGL was measured using a glucometer. Blood samples were taken at least three times and average value was determined. The hypoglycemic effects of the test samples were compared with the BGLs of the control groups ( Sah et al., 2011).
